summary: This mod aims to tweak and 'fix' some of my perceived issues related to skyrim's magic system, whilst also adding in new spells in order to freshen up the schools of magic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b][u]Features [/u][/b][/size][/center]
[b][size=5][color=#000000][center][u]Tweaks:[/u][/center][/color]
[/size][/b]
[b][color=#999999][size=4]Clothing  / Items:[/size][/color][/b]
[list]
[*]All dragon priest's masks are now named correctly.
[*]Morokei’s Mask now increases magicka regeneration by 125%, and is considered clothing with 0 armor rating, and weighs 1.00.
[*]Archmage robes (hooded) now uses up circlet spot as well. -
[*]Archmage robes - all spells cost 20% less to cast and magicka regenerates 150% faster - worth 1250 gold.
[*]Archmage robes (hooded) - all spells cost 35% less to cast and magicka regenerates 200% faster and increases magicka by 75 points. - worth 2000 gold.
[*]Archmage boots - increases magic resistance by 75%. - Worth 250 gold.
[*]Thalmor boots - Increases fire resistance by 15% - worth 25 gold.
[*]Thalmor gloves - Increases magicka regeneration by 20% - worth 35 gold.
[*]Thalmor robes - Reduces destruction spell cost by 15% - worth 220 gold.
[*]Thalmor robes (hooded) - reduces  destruction spell cost by 20% and increases magicka by 45 points. - worth 345 gold
[*]Monk Boots - increases magicka regeneration by 15%
[*]Monk Robes  - reduces restoration cost by 20%
[*]Monk Robes (hooded) - reduces restoration cost by 25% and increases magicka by 25 points.
[*]Savos Aren’s amulet - fortify magicka by 75 points.
[*]Saarthal amulet reduces spell cost by 5%.
[*]Gauldur Amulet now increases magicka by 45 points.
[*]Staff of magnus  - enchantment of 8000 instead of 5000 + absorbs 35 points of health / magicka per second.
[*]Novice robes - specialised school robes now reduces school of magic cost by 10%
[*]Apprentice robes - specialised school robes now reduces school of magic cost by 15%
[*]Adept robes - specialised school robes now reduces school of magic cost by 20%
[*]Expert robes - specialised school robes now reduces school of magic cost by 25%
[*]Master robes - specialised school robes now reduces school of magic cost by 30%
[*]Vaermina robes - Reduces illusion spell cost by 15% and increases magicka regeneration by 50%. - armor rating is now 0.00 instead of 8.00.
[*]Dawnbreaker - Enchantment total increased to 8000 instead of 5000. Increased enchantment cost to 345 and increased fire damage magnitude to 15 points per second.
[*]Ebony blade now swings at 1.25 times the speed and does a base of 20 damage.
[/list]
[b][color=#999999][size=4]Spells / Effects:[/size][/color][/b]
[list]
[*]Firestorm - 75 , 100 , 150
[*]Blizzard - 35 points per second for 15 seconds.
[*]Lightning storm - 100 damage per second
[*]All master destruction spell tomes are 50% more expensive.
[*]Candlelight lasts for 3 minutes but costs 25% more.
[*]Magelight lasts for 2 minutes.
[*]Clairvoyance spell is fire and forget and lasts for 2 minutes and costs 25 magicka.
[*]Dragonhide lasts for 60 seconds.
[*]Oakflesh, stoneflesh, ironflesh and ebonyflesh last for 2 minutes but cost 20% more.
[*]All wards now cost 40% less to cast.
[*]Detect life - costs 30% less to cast.
[*]Detect undead - costs 30% less to cast.
[*]Bound Weapons - Last 100% longer.
[*]Rout spell lasts 60 seconds but same magicka cost.
[*]Raise zombie’s magic effect now increases conjuration far more slowly compared to vanilla.
[*]
[/list][b][color=#999999][size=4]Scrolls / staves:[/size][/color][/b]
[list]
[*]All my changes to spells are carried forward to staves and scrolls.
[*]Some scrolls and staves are fixed so that the spell cast from a scroll /stave will have the same effects as casting the actual spell.
[*]
[/list][b][color=#999999][size=4]NPCS:[/size][/color][/b]
[list]
[*]Mages at the college of winterhold have access to more variety of spells - all wizards at college have + 500 magicka and more spells to use.
[*]Vaermina Devotees will use a range of spells now including flames, firebolt, lightning bolt, muffle, stoneflesh and conjure flame atronach.
[/list][center][color=#000000]
[/color][b][size=5][color=#000000][u]Additions:[/u][/color][/size][/b][/center][b][size=5][color=#000000]
[/color][/size]
